climatePledgeFriendly.details: CarbonNeutral product by Climate Impact Partners measures all the emissions created in the product’s manufacture, makes internal reductions and offsets the remainder.

features: SENSITIVE BABY WIPES: Burt's Bees Baby Wipes have a cloth-like texture and are non-irritating and fragrance-free, providing gentle comfort while cleaning baby's delicate skin
NATURAL FORMULA: These baby wipes are 99.2% natural origin, lovingly made with soft cloth-like fabric for gentle use on baby's dry and sensitive skin areas
NO UNNECESSARY INGREDIENTS: Unscented baby wipes are formulated without synthetic fragrances, parabens, phthalates, or petrolatum, infused with aloe and vitamin E
PEDIATRICIAN TESTED: Accepted by the National Eczema Association, these wipes are clinically proven to be effective and non-irritating on sensitive skin
NATURAL BABY WIPES: The perfect addition to any diaper bag, baby shower gift or new baby gift set, these unscented baby wipes are always smart to have on hand
body.description: Mamas asked. Nature heard. Meet Burts Bees Baby Wipes that are made to help soothe and cleanse babys sensitive skin with natural, non-irritating ingredients. These cloth-like, fragrance-free wipes for babies are lovingly infused with aloe and vitamin E, which is gentle for everyday use on faces or bottoms. We use aloe vera in many of our products because it is a great moisturizer that helps soothe dry skin. The cloth-like texture has a soft hand feel for a non-irritating clean on delicate skin. Accepted by the National Eczema Association and pediatrician tested, these 99.2% natural origin baby wipes are fragrance free and formulated without additives such as synthetic fragrances, parabens, phthalates, or petrolatum. The perfect addition to any diaper bag, baby shower gift or new baby gift set, these unscented baby wipes are always smart to have on hand. Nurture baby's skin naturally with Burt's Bees Baby Wipes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bath Time Our Bubble Bath and tear-free Shampoo & Wash make bath time fun and safe. Diaper Duty Wipes, Multi-Purpose Ointments and Talc-Free Dusting Powder go easy on your baby's bottom. Everyday Care Designed with your baby's skin in mind, our Nourishing Lotion keeps delicate skin soft and comforted. Formula & Remedies Nourish your baby with USDA Organic formulas inspired by breast milk, and find soothing solutions with nature-inspired remedies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are the best forumla of wipes their is, if these wipes could only be larger like the momcozy brand or other water wipes it would top the cake for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fave baby wipes
reviews.reviewText: Cheaper than the “hand and face wipes” but obv can use in place of them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am a senior and I use these for personal cleaning pads
reviews.reviewText: I use it on my face and arms during the day and I love everything about them especially the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good wipes, poor packaging
reviews.reviewText: Mostly love them, very soft and gentle. Just 2 minor annoyances with the packaging:1. Top flap sometimes comes off and doesn't reseal properly. When it happens I just place it on top and it doesn't seal but its good enough they haven't dried our on me yet and I live in an arid region.2. The wipes don't separate easily like tissues, I often get several coming out at once and have to stuff the extra back in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A clean feeling like no other.
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are soft and moisturizing. I feel extremely clean after using them after going to the bathroom. I’m a wipes user not a toilet paper user and these have me feeling refreshed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product, will continue to use it again and again.
reviews.reviewText: Will continue to use this product as it is awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Product Ruined by Poor Packaging
reviews.reviewText: I like the product and it works well on sensitive skin ... in that regard it's perfect. However, I'm deducting two stars for the packaging which, quite simply, is terrible. The dispenser lid is a thin flexible plastic tab affair (see photo) that uses what looks to be a layer of adhesive to bind the lid to the dispenser. It's not a positive closure mechanism (e.g., not like other lids that click into place so you know its locked closed) and when the inevitable happens ... you go to pull out one wipe, get ten, then try to put nine back for the next time - it doesn't work very well because the dispenser surface is no longer flat (because of the nine clumped-together wipes) meaning that there's less area for the adhesive to bind to.The seam between wipes is virtually undetectable both visually and tactilely, leading to a lot of over-dispenses. This is not a problem unique to this product. Why, oh why, can't someone come up with a solution to this? It's a common complaint and an issue the manufacturers seem tone-deaf on.If you have your own dispenser and are transferring these wipes to it, then I would say go ahead and buy without hesitation ... but if not, be aware of the annoying usability problems you'll likely have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only wipes my grandboys let me clean their hands and faces with.
reviews.reviewText: Best wipes ever! I've parented and grandparented for 29 years and I've never seen wipes like these. They're soft, light scent, have a foamy bit of soap, but not soap because it doesn't feel sticky and does quickly. Great for diaper rash, doesn't sting.
